name: John Doe
details: The quality of the basketball was excellent! Very durable and met all my expectations.

name: Sarah Smith
details: The running shoes were comfortable, but the size ran a bit smaller than expected.

name: Michael Johnson
details: The tennis racket grip was amazing, but the delivery took longer than promised.

name: Emily Brown
details: Loved the yoga mat! It's lightweight and offers great support during workouts.

name: David Lee
details: The soccer ball lost air quickly after a few uses. Not satisfied.
